headline.main: MEXICO TAKES LEAD IN PENTATHLON MEET

docs.snippet: Canadian dollar firm in the early part of the week turned erratic on hectic dealings on Thursday following the announcement establishing a fixed rate for the dollar at 92.50 cents. British pound sterling improved on active trading.
docs.lead_paragraph: Canadian dollar firm in the early part of the week turned erratic on hectic dealings on Thursday following the announcement establishing a fixed rate for the dollar at 92.50 cents. British pound sterling improved on active trading.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, May 7-- Argentina's new Foreign Minister has warned his Foreign Office and Argentine diplomats abroad that he will tolerate no so-called neutralist policies. He told these officials who were not in accord with this stand to resign...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, May 7-- Argentina's new Foreign Minister has warned his Foreign Office and Argentine diplomats abroad that he will tolerate no so-called neutralist policies. He told these officials who were not in accord with this stand to resign immediately.
docs.abstract: Min del Carril indicates Argentina now backs US against Cuba

headline.main: ARGENTINA SETS PRO-WEST COURSE; New Foreign Chief Backs U.S. and Opposes Cuba

byline.original: By EDWARD C. BURKS Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: The following quotations are selling prices in United States dollars and cents for free market banknote transactions at New York. These notes do not apply to regular foreign exchange business transacted by banks.

docs.snippet: SAN ANTONIO, May 9 (AP)  A United States Naval Reserve officer, Robert Beck, of Philadelphia, won the international pentathlon competition today despite finishing thirteenth in the 4,000-meter crosscountry run.
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN ANTONIO, May 9 (AP) A United States Naval Reserve officer, Robert Beck, of Philadelphia, won the international pentathlon competition today despite finishing thirteenth in the 4,000-meter crosscountry run.
docs.abstract: R Beck (US) wins individual title; Mex, team champ

headline.main: BECK OF U.S. WINS PENTATHLON TITLE; Mexico Gains Team Honors in Meet at San Antonio
